_note: Real events from Montgomery County chambers of commerce. Updated via web scraping.

events.title: MCCC Morning Mixer
events.location: Montgomery County Chamber of Commerce, Rockville, MD
events.description: Start your day with networking! Join fellow chamber members for coffee, conversation, and connections at our monthly Morning Mixer.

events.title: MCCC Business EXCELerator
events.location: Montgomery County Chamber of Commerce, Rockville, MD
events.description: Accelerate your business growth with our Business EXCELerator program. Learn strategies, share experiences, and network with other business leaders.

events.title: MCCC Chamber After Hours
events.description: Unwind after work with fellow chamber members at our monthly After Hours networking event. Casual atmosphere, great connections.

events.title: GGCC Monthly Networking Breakfast
events.description: Join the Gaithersburg-Germantown Chamber for our monthly networking breakfast. Meet local business owners and expand your network.

events.title: GGCC Ribbon Cutting Ceremony
events.description: Celebrate a new business opening in our community! Join us for a ribbon cutting ceremony and support local entrepreneurship.

events.title: Maryland Chamber Policy Forum
events.location: Maryland Chamber of Commerce, Annapolis, MD
events.description: Join business leaders from across Maryland to discuss policy issues affecting the business community. Network with policymakers and fellow business owners.

events.title: Maryland Business Outlook 2026
events.description: Annual event featuring economic forecasts, business trends, and networking opportunities. Learn what to expect for Maryland businesses in 2026.
